partnerRightToReside.legend: Does your partner have the right to live or work in the UK without any immigration restrictions?
partnerRightToReside.hint: You have this right if you have a British passport or are a British citizen or British subject with right of abode.
partnerRightToReside.required: Select yes if your partner has the right to live or work in the UK without any immigration restrictions.

partnerLived2Years.legend: Has your partner lived permanently in the UK for the last 2 years?
partnerLived2Years.required: Select yes if your partner has lived permanently in the Uk for the last 2 years.
